title: Bizarre Mars - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/21/20
itunes:title: Bizarre Mars - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/21/20
description:
George Noory and author Marc Hartzman explore his research into mankind's continued obsession with the planet Mars, and shares stories of a man communicating telepathically with a martian woman, and discusses Orson Welles' famous "War of the Worlds" radio broadcast.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: An author shares some of his favorite stories dealing with the red planet.
